GcmHelper

Method Detail

getGCMRegistrationId

public static java.lang.String getGCMRegistrationId(android.app.Activity activity,
                                                    GcmHelper.GCMListener listener)
Checks if already registered with GooglePlayServices. If already registered the registration id is returned. If not registered, null will be returned and registration will occur - the response will be returned to the GcmHelper.GCMListener.

Parameters:
activity -
listener -
Returns:
the registration id if registered otherwise null.

checkPlayServices

private static boolean checkPlayServices(android.app.Activity activity)
Check the device to make sure it has the Google Play Services APK. If it doesn't, display a dialog that allows users to download the APK from the Google Play Store or enable it in the device's system settings.

storeRegistrationId

private static void storeRegistrationId(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String regId)
Stores the registration ID and the app versionCode in the application's SharedPreferences.

Parameters:
context - application's context.
regId - registration ID

getRegistrationId

public static java.lang.String getRegistrationId(android.content.Context context)
Gets the current registration ID for application on GCM service, if there is one.

If result is empty, the app needs to register.

Returns:
registration ID, or empty string if there is no existing registration ID.

storeCheckPlayServices

private static void storeCheckPlayServices(android.content.Context context,
                                           boolean checkPlayServices)

shouldCheckPlayServices

private static boolean shouldCheckPlayServices(android.content.Context context)

registerInBackground

private static void registerInBackground(android.content.Context context,
                                         GcmHelper.GCMListener listener)
Registers the application with GCM servers asynchronously.

Stores the registration ID and the app versionCode in the application's shared preferences.
